mapper.insert: INSERT INTO counseling (dog_id, phone, content, is_completed, created_by, updated_by) VALUES (#{dogId}, #{phone}, #{content}, #{isCompleted}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM counseling WHERE counseling_id = #{counselingId} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM counseling WHERE dog_id = #{dogId} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT c.counseling_id AS counselingId, d.name AS dogName, u.name AS ownerName FROM counseling c JOIN dog d ON c.dog_id = d.dog_id JOIN user u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.is_completed = CASE WHEN #{completed} = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AND c.is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE counseling SET content = #{content}, is_completed = 1, updated_by = #{trainerId}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE counseling_id = #{counselingId} AND is_deleted = 0;
